message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I claimed the welcome bonus, but I’m not sure if I’ve met the wagering requirements. Can you check?
I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can take a look at your account and provide the details. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is James Carter, my email is james.c@example.com, and my date of birth is May 3, 1987.
Thanks, James. That's all correct! I can see that you have wagered $750 so far. To meet the requirements for the welcome bonus, you need to wager a total of $1,500.
Alright, and do all my bets count towards it?
Slots contribute 100% towards the wagering requirement, while table games like blackjack and baccarat contribute 20%. Sports bets do not count towards the requirement.
Got it. Is there a deadline to complete the wagering?
Yes, you have 30 days from the date you claimed the bonus to meet the wagering requirements. If not met, the bonus and any associated winnings will be forfeited.
Thanks for the info! I’ll try to finish it before the deadline.
You're very welcome, James! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
